description: When conditions change faster than you can find powder lines, this popular 3-in-1 jacket lets you wear a waterproof-breathable Omni-Tech™ shell or an insulated Omni-Heat™ liner—or both together for serious snow and cold. It boasts a suite of mountain-ready features, including a powder skirt, an adjustable hood, and tons of pockets for stashing your ski pass, goggles, and more.
name: Columbia Sportswear Whirlibird IV Interchange Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 100% nylon 210T taffeta, 100% Polyester, Omni-Tech™ Generation Dobby 100% nylon, Thermarator™ 100% polyester
